thread.title: Warriors' Barnes leaves game with injury
thread.title_full: Warriors' Barnes leaves game with injury

author:
Diamond Leung

dleung@bayareanewsgroup.com
title: Warriors' Barnes leaves game with injury
text:
Warriors' Barnes leaves game with injury By Diamond Leung Posted: 10/13/2015 09:25:28 PM   09:25:29 PM PDT OAKLAND -- Warriors forward Harrison Barnes suffered a right knee sprain in the second quarter of Tuesday's preseason game against the Denver Nuggets and was expected to miss the rest of the contest. 
Barnes suffered the injury and did not immediately return to the sideline after halftime, as Andre Iguodala took his place in the lineup. 
Barnes started in every game for the Warriors last season as they won the championship. He averaged 10.1 points and 5.5 rebounds. 
Barnes, 23, can sign a contract extension with the Warriors by the Oct. 31 deadline or become a restricted free agent next summer. For more on the Warriors, see the Inside the Warriors blog at www.ibabuzz.com/warriors . Follow Diamond Leung on Twitter at twitter.com/diamond83 . Advertisement
